subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
Hockey, Ice
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: There are no franchise shifters in Thursday night’s N.B.A. draft, but it could be a big night for Duke’s Kyrie Irving and the Cleveland Cavaliers.
snippet: There are no franchise shifters in Thursday night’s N.B.A. draft, but it could be a big night for Duke’s Kyrie Irving and the Cleveland Cavaliers.
